p: Another major source of public-facing discourse around plastics, especially packaging, is that of UK supermarket websites. Using BootCat again, we identified and scraped relevant webpages from the websites of eight of the UK’s largest supermarkets, with varying degrees of success: Co-op, Ocado, M&S, Asda, Sainsbury’s, Morrisons, Tesco, and Waitrose. The tuples used to gather this data are listed in Appendix A.
